name: EsriVoiceDemo
0:
”Alexa, open E. S. R. I. Voice Demo”
”Alexa, ask E. S. R. I. Voice Demo to show me an ArcGIS Example”
”Alexa, ask E. S. R. I. Voice Demo to learn more”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. s. r. i. voice demo
Developer Terms of Use
des: ESRI Voice demo showcases the mapping and data analytics abilities of the ArcGIS software to make location intelligence accessible for organizations. Listen to the various use cases that explain how GIS tech combined with the science of geography can unlock authoritative data and help you expedite business success.
